experiences.title: Software Engineer
experiences.subtitle: Paycom
workDescription: Implemented the ability for users to share their screen with a customer service employee from Paycom’s client web pages
Added a recording option to save webpage sharing sessions to Paycom’s servers
Managed the SQL database for our project and implemented SQL queries to the backend server

experiences.title: Software Engineer
experiences.subtitle: Favor
workDescription: Reduced Favor’s response time through the addition of ETag headers and Cache-Control Headers via middleware and a new response interface that is used widely on all core services
Worked with large datasets to group users based on value to the company and implemented this cohosting in marketing tools
Implemented custom events and listeners and published these events to marketing tools
Fixed vulnerabilities in services to prevent outages
